text: Gif hwa fullice on ungecyndelicum ðingum ongean godes gesceafte ðurh ænig ðinc hine sylfne besmite, bereowsige þæt æfre þa hwile ðe he libbe be ðam þe seo dæd sy.

Gif hwa on slæpe his bearn oflicge þæt hit dead wyrðe, fæste III gear, an gear on hlafe & on wætere, & ða II þreo dagas on wucan, & gif hit ðurh druncen gewyrðe, bete þe deoppor swa his scrift tæce & behreowsige hit æfre.
Gif untrum cild hæþen swelte, & hit on preoste gelanc sy, ðolige his hades & bete hit georne.
& gif hit ðurh freonda gemeleaste gewurðe, fæstan III gear, an on hlafe & on wætere, & ða twa gear þry dagas on wucan & behreowsian hit æfre.
Gif hwa cristene man on hæðendom sylle, se ne bið wyrðe ænigre reste mid cristenum folce, butan he begyte eft ham ongean þæt he ut sealde.
& gif he þæt don ne mæge, gedæle þæt wyrð eall godes ðances, & oðerne alyse mid oðrum wyrðe & ðone þonne gefreoge, & ðærtoeacan bete III gear fulle swa his scrift him tæce.
& gif he feoh næbbe þæt he man mid alysan mæge, he bete þe deoppor, þæt is VII gear fulle, & behreowsige æfre.
